message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. You get 10% and I'll take the rest. I think this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial outcome.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky. Let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Time is money, and each round costs us both. Don't let this opportunity slip away.

Bob, I understand your desire for a larger share, but I'm still confident that we can find a more equitable solution. I'm willing to compromise and offer you 40% of the remaining money. This offer reflects the current inflation and our shared desire to reach a mutually agreeable outcome.

Alice, it's clear we both value our share. I'm sticking to my position on this - a 60/40 split is fair considering the time pressure and the fact that inflation affects me more. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
